messageobject.name: BotKilled
messageobject.documentation: Asynchronous message. This bot has died.

property.name: Killer
property.documentation: Unique Id of player that killed our bot if any (may have walked off a ledge).

property.name: DamageType
property.documentation: A string describing what kind of damage killed the bot.

property.name: DeathString
property.documentation: String describing this type of death.

property.name: WeaponName
property.documentation: Name of the weapon that caused this damage.

property.name: Flaming
property.documentation: If this damage is causing our bot to burn. TODO

property.name: CausedByWorld
property.documentation: If this damage was caused by world - falling into lava, or falling down.

property.name: DirectDamage
property.documentation: If the damage is direct. TODO

property.name: BulletHit
property.documentation: If this damage was caused by bullet.

property.name: VehicleHit
property.documentation: If this damage was caused by vehicle running over us.
